Rabies (Tests for rabies virus by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    60270-6 Rabies virus RNA [Presence] in Isolate by NAA with probe detection
    6536-7 Rabies virus identified in Tissue by Organism specific culture
    6539-1 Rabies virus identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
